titles.title: Supporting Children of the National Guard and Reserve Act
Supporting Children of the National Guard and Reserve Act

A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to expand the military student identifier program to cover students with a parent who serves in the reserve component of the Armed Forces.
Supporting Children of the National Guard and Reserve Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
